video_prompt: A young woman's face, her flowing blonde hair subtly shifting as if windblown. Her expressive blue eyes slowly blink, drawing focus. The watercolor background subtly blends and flows, creating a dynamic, ethereal atmosphere. Her lips gently part and reform, hinting at soft breath.
image_prompt: Vivid watercolor portrait, young woman's upper face, bright blue eyes with voluminous lashes, delicate eyeliner. Pale blonde, windblown hair framing face. Soft, translucent skin with pink flush, glossy pink lips. Abstract teal and deep blue watercolor background, ethereal. Stylized anime/fashion illustration.
refined_video_prompt: Windblown blonde hair subtly shifts. Expressive blue eyes slowly blink. The watercolor background subtly blends and flows, creating an ethereal atmosphere. Lips gently part and reform, hinting at soft breath.
